'''Maple Wood Tanuki''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Maple Wood Tanuki is obtainable from [[Netsuke no Gen Crafts]] for 10 [[Electro Sigil]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Maple Wood = 6
|Fabric = 6
|sort = Maple Wood;Fabric
}}
